content.text:
# 2018 President's Cup (tennis) – Women's singles__disambig_1

Ekaterine Gorgodze
| runner   =  Sabina Sharipova
| score    = 6–4, 6–1
| before_name = President's Cup (tennis) – Women's singles
| after_name = President's Cup (tennis) – Women's singles
}}
Zhang Shuai was the defending champion, but chose not to participate.
Ekaterine Gorgodze won the title after defeating Sabina Sharipova 6–4, 6–1 in the final.
Seeds
Sabina Sharipova (final)
#  Marie Bouzková (semifinals)
#  Nina Stojanović (second round)
#  Olga Doroshina (quarterfinals)
#  Ekaterine Gorgodze (champion)
#  Nigina Abduraimova (second round)
#  Valeria Savinykh (second round)
#  Mai Minokoshi (second round)
}}
